document.full_text: a woman in new york city who runs a baked goods-shop called "one tough cookie" filed a trademark suit in federal court on wednesday to stop the food network from airing a new bakery-based reality show called "tough cookies."
document.title: baker wants to crumble plan for cookie reality show
lines_and_colors: a woman in new york city who runs a baked goods-shop called "one tough cookie" filed a trademark suit in federal court on wednesday to stop the food network from airing a new bakery-based reality show called "tough cookies."
